title.default: What component(s) are you looking to setup?
title.da: Hvilke(n) komponent(er) ønsker du at opsætte?

text.default: Main solution
text.da: Hovedløsning

text.default: Satellite solution
text.da: Satellitløsning

text.default: Security Group Setup
text.da: Opsætning af sikkerhedsgruppe

html.default: Will collect connection information for Main solution deployment. The main solution manages and monitors metered Power Automate Desktop solutions. Normally there will be one Main solution deployment per Power Platform tenant
html.da: Indsamler forbindelsesoplysninger til installation af hovedløsningen. Hovedløsningen administrerer og overvåger forbrugsafregnede Power Automate Desktop-løsninger. Normalt vil der være én installation af hovedløsningen pr. Power Platform lejer

html.default: Will collect information required to setup a monitored Power Platform environment. Power Automate cloud flows to centralize information with the central main solution Automation Kit environment. Normally there will be multiple satellite solution deployments per Power Platform tenant
html.da: Vil indsamle oplysninger, der kræves for at konfigurere et overvåget Power Platform miljø. Power Automate-cloudflow for at centralisere oplysninger med det centrale Automation Kit-miljø for hovedløsningen. Normalt vil der være flere satellitløsningsinstallationer pr. Power Platform lejer

html.default: Configure users / groups that should be assigned to security groups for Administration, Contribution and View permissions for Automation projects
html.da: Konfigurere brugere/grupper, der skal tildeles sikkerhedsgrupper for administrations-, bidrags- og visningstilladelser til automatiseringsprojekter

title.default: Verify that the following has been setup for the environment you will install the Automation Kit Main solution
title.da: Kontrollér, at følgende er konfigureret til det miljø, du vil installere hovedløsningen Automation Kit

choices.value: You have have environment administrator rights so we can enable [PowerApps component framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)

text.default: You have have environment administrator rights so we can enable [PowerApps component framework feature](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-apps/developer/component-framework/component-framework-for-canvas-apps#enable-the-power-apps-component-framework-feature)

choices.value: I DO NOT have environment administrator rights

text.default: I DO NOT have environment administrator rights
text.da: JEG HAR IKKE miljøadministratorrettigheder

text.default: [Install Microsoft Power Platform CLI](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/developer/cli/introduction#install-microsoft-power-platform-cli)
text.da: [Installer Microsoft Power Platform CLI](https://learn.microsoft.com/power-platform/developer/cli/introduction#install-microsoft-power-platform-cli)

choices.value: The environment DLP policy allows for following connectors [Approvals](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/approvals/), [Microsoft Dataverse](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/commondataserviceforapps/), [Office 365 Outlook](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365/), [Office 365 Users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365users/) and [Power Platform for Admins](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/powerplatformforadmins/)

text.default: The environment DLP policy allows for following connectors [Approvals](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/approvals/), [Microsoft Dataverse](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/commondataserviceforapps/), [Office 365 Outlook](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365/), [Office 365 Users](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/office365users/) and [Power Platform for Admins](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/connectors/powerplatformforadmins/)

choices.value: Office E3 license or above for Office 365 Outlook connection used by Cloud Flow

text.da: Office E3-licens eller nyere til Office 365 Outlook-forbindelse, der bruges af Cloud Flow

html.default: Sample Corporate Goals, Automation Projects and telemetry data will be imported

html.da: Kun basisdata, der kræves til løsning, importeres

title.default: Enable Return on Investment (ROI) Power Automate cloud flow?

html.default: The ROI cloud flow will be enabled so that complexity and ROI are calculated when Automation Projects are inserted or updated
html.da: Cloudflowet ROI aktiveres, så kompleksitet og ROI beregnes, når automatiseringsprojekter indsættes eller opdateres

html.default: You can enable the ROI cloud flow after update
html.da: Du kan aktivere cloudflowet ROI efter opdatering

title.default: Enable Approval Power Automate cloud flow?

html.default: The Approval cloud flow will be enabled so that approval requests are sent to approvers
html.da: Cloudflowet Godkendelse aktiveres, så godkendelsesanmodninger sendes til godkendere

html.default: You can enable the Approval cloud flow after update
html.da: Du kan aktivere cloudflowet Godkendelse efter opdatering

title.default: Enable Synchronization of Automation Kit data between environments?
title.da: Aktivere synkronisering af Automation Kit-data mellem miljøer?

html.default: The Synchronization cloud flow will be enabled so data is sychronized with satellite environments
html.da: Cloudflowet Synkronisering aktiveres, så data sykroniseres med satellitmiljøer

html.default: You can enable the Synchronization cloud flow after update
html.da: Du kan aktivere synkroniseringscloudflowet efter opdatering

html.default:
**NOTES:**
- To import satellite solution, the user needs Azure Key Vault role of [Key Vault Secret User](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/key-vault/general/rbac-migration#access-policies-to-azure-roles-mapping) or higher
- The Azure Key Vault (AKV) settings below should have the following format /subscriptions/{Subscription ID}/resourceGroups/{Resource Group Name}/providers/Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/{Key Vault Name}/secrets/{Secret Name}
- As the flow owner the importing user will need **Basic User** and **Service Reader**
html.da:
**NOTER:**
- For at importere satellitløsning har brugeren brug for Azure Key Vault-rollen som [Key Vault hemmelig bruger](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/key-vault/general/rbac-migration#access-policies-to-azure-roles-mapping) eller højere
- Indstillingerne for Azure Key Vault (AKV) nedenfor skal have følgende format /subscriptions//ritzau//ritzau/ Microsoft.KeyVault/hvælvinger//Hemmeligheder/
- Som flowejer skal den importerende bruger bruge **Grundlæggende bruger** og **Servicelæser**

title.default: Flow Session Trace Record Owner Id
Store the extracted Power Automate Desktop script in Dataverse?
title.da: Gemme det udpakkede Power Automate Desktop-script i Dataverse?

html.default: Will store Desktop flows definition script inside the Desktop Flow Definition table. This field could contain sensitive information
html.da: Vilje butik Skrivebordsflowdefinitionsscript i tabellen Definition af skrivebordsflow. Dette felt kan indeholde følsomme oplysninger

html.default: Will NOT Desktop flows definition script inside the Desktop Flow Definition table. NOTE: This field could contain sensitive information
html.da: Vilje IKKE Skrivebordsflowdefinitionsscript i tabellen Definition af skrivebordsflow. BEMÆRK: Dette felt kan indeholde følsomme oplysninger

html.default: Will enable Cloud flows that are included in the Automation Kit Satellite solution
html.da: Vil aktivere cloud-flows, der er inkluderet i Automation Kit Satellite-løsningen

title.default: Create the Azure app id as a Dataverse Application User?

title.da: Navn på Azure-program, der skal registreres?

title.default: What is the Azure Application Id to register as Application User?
title.da: Hvad er Azure-program-id'et for at registrere sig som programbruger?

html.default: Use the download button below to obtain your satellite configuration file that will be used to customize your deployment
html.da: Brug downloadknappen nedenfor til at hente din satellitkonfigurationsfil, der vil blive brugt til at tilpasse din implementering
